definition[0]: if someone is in arrears, or if their payments are in arrears, they are late in paying something that they should pay regularly, such as rent
note[0]: fall/get into arrears (=become late with payments)
example[0]: Many people are in arrears with their rent.
example[1]: The rent money is two months in arrears.
note[1]: be four weeks/three months etc in arrears
